name: designportfolio
description: personal website using graphql and nuxt and flutter

scripts.precommit: npm run precommit --prefix nuxt && gofmt -w graphql && npm run precommit --prefix amp && npm run precommit --prefix init && npm run precommit --prefix docs && git add -A
scripts.init: yarn install && cd nuxt && yarn install && cd ../docs && yarn install && cd ../amp && yarn install && cd ../init && yarn install && cd ..

author: Annette von Brandis
